1091731789486403585.text: Smart contract, middleware, and dapp devs will remember how much gas is used in a given transaction better if we measure it in kilogas. 21 kgas vs. 21,000 gas. (And we should still abstract gas away wherever possible too.)

1072235727738601474.text:
I did a brain dump on interacting with smart contracts from a dapp front end.

TL;DR: Use a pubsub-like style.

I'm proposing what I think is the right level of abstraction for reading data from and writing data to contracts (and listening for events).

https://github.com/tasitlabs/TasitSDK/blob/develop/packages/tasit-act/README.md …
